author: rovere
body: #### PR description: Remove unnecessary memset operations on all cases in which the memory is in any case written by the kernels w/o assuming any previous value. In all other cases, leave the memset operations to preserve the correctness of the algorithms. #### PR validation: Run on a set of events, the output, in terms of `Tracksters` is identical. The performance has improved both running on GPU and, also, using the alpaka Serial CPU backend (thanks @mmusich for the results of the tests!!) To properly test this PR, we also need an updated version of the CLUE external library: cms-sw/cmsdist#10114
title: Improve performance of heterogeneous CLUE.
